authentication_docs.description: Images or Documents that authenticate the experiment - eg. gel picture
authentication_docs.title: Authentication Documents

description.description: A short description of the experiment
description.title: Description

processed_files.description: Processed files that are derived from files in this experiment.
processed_files.title: Processed Files

follows_sop.description: Flag to indicate if the 4DN SOP for the selected type of experiment was followed - Yes or No
follows_sop.title: Follows SOP

reference_files.description: Reference files associated with this experiment (ex. file of sequencing barcodes).
reference_files.title: Reference Files

biosample_quantity_units.description: The units that go along with the biological sample quantity
biosample_quantity_units.title: Biosample Quantity Units

experiment_type.description: A controlled term specifying the type of experiment.
experiment_type.title: Experiment Type

___relationship_type.description: A controlled term specifying the relationship between experiments.
___relationship_type.title: Relationship Type

protocol_variation.description: Protocol Documents Describing the variations in the protocol from reference.
protocol_variation.title: Protocol Documents

items.description: A document associated with the specific experimental protocol.
items.title: Document

files.description: Information about the data files associated with the experiment.
files.title: Data Files

quality_metric_flags.description: Flags and associated info for flagging experiments with possible issues
quality_metric_flags.title: Quality Metric Flags

items.description: A flag for this experiment with link to associated QC info.
items.title: Flag

biosample_quantity.description: The amount of starting Biological sample going into the experiment
biosample_quantity.title: Biosample Quantity

filesets.description: Information about a set of data files associated with the experiment.
filesets.title: Sets of Data Files

items.description: Metadata on a set of files.
items.title: Fileset

___non_biotinylated_spikein_source.description: The source or identifier for the spike-in
___non_biotinylated_spikein_source.title: Spike in source

___secondary_antibody_dilution.description: The working dilution or concentration of the antibody eg. 1:100 or 200 ug/ml
___secondary_antibody_dilution.title: Secondary Antibody Dilution/Concentration

___reaction_buffer.description: The components of the reaction buffer for the tyramide reaction.
___reaction_buffer.title: Reaction Buffer

___non_biotinylated_spikein_sequences.description: Reference to a Reference File Item with multi fasta of the spike in sequences - spikein concentration info can be added as a 'conc' extra_file
___non_biotinylated_spikein_sequences.title: Spike In Sequences

___reaction_temperature.description: Temperature of tyramide reaction step in degrees Celsius
___reaction_temperature.title: Reaction Temperature (°C)

___tyramide_concentration.description: The concentration or dilution of tyramide used in the TSA reaction.
___tyramide_concentration.title: Tyramide Concentration

___secondary_antibody_lot_id.description: A lot number or other unique identifier for a particular antibody lot
___secondary_antibody_lot_id.title: Secondary Antibody Lot Number

___targeted_factor.description: Information about the target of the Antibody in an IP
___targeted_factor.title: Target

___average_biotin_range.description: Estimated average biotinlyation range from dot blot (kb/1 biotin）
___average_biotin_range.title: Biotynylation range

___biotinylated_spikein_sequences.description: Reference to a Reference File Item with multi fasta of the spike in sequences - spikein concentration info can be added as a 'conc' extra_file
___biotinylated_spikein_sequences.title: Modified Spike In Sequences

___protocol_version.description: Version of the protocol used in the experiment
___protocol_version.title: Protocol version

___affinity_rounds.description: If there are multiple rounds of purification - eg. 2 biotin affinity purifications for TSA-seq
___affinity_rounds.title: Number of rounds of affinity purification

___biotinylated_spikein_source.description: The source or identifier for the spike-in
___biotinylated_spikein_source.title: Modified Spike in source
